Tolkien-related events that took place in 1908.

content.title: Early
content.content: ? - Ronald and Hilary Tolkien move to 37 Duchess Road, behind the Birmingham Oratory, into a room let by a Mrs. Faulkner.

content.title: February
content.content: 13 - Patrick Barr, who would voice Gamling in The Lord of the Rings (1981 radio series), is born.

? - J.R.R. Tolkien begins his first term at Oxford University.
Years
1905 1906 1907 1908 1909 1910 1911
